title: K&M KÃ¶nig & Meyer Saxxy Saxophone In-Bell Tripod 3 Leg Stand 14350.000.55 | Professional Grade for all Musicians | Lightweight Ultra-Compact | Stable Secure Bb Tenor Base | Made in Germany Black
features: THE INNOVATIVE LEADER IN STAND TECHNOLOGY: K&M Saxxy Saxophone In-Bell stand is a practical, robust and handy stable stand for Bb tenor saxophones. Compact, take it wherever you play, just unfold the legs for a secure, safe resting place for your sax.

PROTECT WHAT MATTERS: Soft rubber non-marring plastic pads protect your instrument from scratches and provide a secure fit. For added stability, the steel tripod base has solid rubber foot end caps to keep it from slipping on all floor surfaces.

TRUSTED DESIGN: A favorite among musicians, this easy to use reliable stand will become your go-to stand and give many years of service! Super convenient, it folds very small and can be stored and transported in the supplied velour bag in the sax bell.

SUPERIOR QUALITY: Reflecting on our commitment to world-class construction, all of our products are made in Germany. Designed with best-in-class quality standards, we offer a 5-year product warranty and 10-year on replacement parts availability.

ECO-FRIENDLY: For over 70 years, K&M is the go-to brand for premium stands and holders. Committed to Environmental Protection, our eco-conscious company has ISO certification for effective and responsible resource consumption and environmental impact.
description: Saxxy saxophone stand regular Fits most tenor saxophones.
